scripts.migrate:local: bash ./migrate.sh && wrangler d1 migrations apply errors --local
scripts.migrate:prod: bash ./migrate.sh && wrangler d1 migrations apply errors
scripts.dev: pnpm build && NO_D1_WARNING=true wrangler dev --no-bundle dist/worker.js
scripts.release: pnpm build && NO_D1_WARNING=true wrangler deploy --no-bundle --no-minify dist/worker.js
